tool_description: A tool for handling synonyms, antonyms, hyponyms and hypernyms.
name: Synonyms
title: Synonyms

api_list.name: synonyms
api_list.description: Returns a list of synonyms for the given word.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://languagetools.p.rapidapi.com/synonyms/dog"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "languagetools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://languagetools.p.rapidapi.com/synonyms/{word}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "languagetools.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Antonyms
api_list.description: Returns a list of antonyms for the given word.

api_list.name: Hypernyms
api_list.description: Returns a list of hypernyms for the given word.

api_list.name: Hyponyms
api_list.description: Returns a list of hyponyms for the given word.

api_list.name: All
api_list.description: Returns all synonyms, antonyms, hypernyms, and hyponyms for the given word.
